Nuts and seeds are rich in healthy fats, protein, and essential nutrients like magnesium and zinc.
Whole grains like brown rice, quinoa, and whole wheat pasta can provide complex carbohydrates and fiber.
Eggs and dairy products like milk, yogurt, and cheese can provide calcium and protein.
Aquatic plants like seaweed and algae can be used as a source of vitamins and minerals like iodine and vitamin K.
Fermented foods like sauerkraut, kimchi, and kefir can provide probiotics and support gut health.
